text: As an app developer aiming for low-resource environments, I want to build a text-based Solid chat tool.
label: Chat

text: As a community member, I want to create a Pod/RDF archive of gitter chat rooms relevant to the community.
label: Chat

text: As a existing Solid user, I would like to use my identity to register a Pod with another Provider so that I can have different Pods for different purposes, or to migrate data
label: Authentication

text: As a Solid Identity Provider, I would like it to be easy for my users to register with Pod Providers to increase the value of my IdP offering
label: Authentication

text: As a Solid Identity Provider, I would like to easily register new users with an identity so that they quickly become customers
label: Authentication

text: As a Solid user I want to chat with other Solid users so that I can communicate when not being physically in the same place
label: Chat

text: As a Solid user, I’d like a sync app to automatically upload my contacts and pictures to my Pod, so I don’t have to enter them manually
label: Contacts

text: As a person, I'd like to see all data generated about me in one dashboard even if they're not on my Pod, so I have one place to get an overview of everything relevant to me
label: Aggregation

text: As a Solid user who is not compus mentus I want my interests to be protected so that I am not taken advantage of when I am in a vulnerable position
label: Accessibility

text: As a Solid user who is not computer savvy I want my data wishes to be respected so that my wishes are not compromised by my knowledge
label: Accessibility

text: As a Solid user with visual impairments I want to be able to increase the font size so that I can continue using Solid functionality in the same way as other Solid users
label: Accessibility

text: As a colour blind Solid user I want to use Solid normally e.g. have a monochrome interface with a highlight colour if essential so that I can use the same tools as other Solid users
label: Accessibility

text: As a Solid user I want to read and navigate with voice control so that I can have access to the same tools as Solid users without read and navigations restrictions
label: Accessibility

text: As a Solid user with motor problems I want to be able to navigate by data by keyboard so that I can have access to the same tools as Solid users without motor problems
label: Accessibility

text: As a Solid user I want to be able to identify myself without association to the identifier so that I am not overdependent on an entity that I cannot control
label: Authentication

text: As a Solid user I want to be able to identify myself online so that others can trust me in online interactions
label: Authentication

text: As a Solid user I want to be able to sign up for an online identification with webid so that I can identify myself online
label: Authentication

text: As an operator of wifi for restaurants, hotels, etc I'd like to allow clients to use their WebID to log in so that we don't need to manage passwords or have a captive portal.
label: Authentication

text: As a developer/power user, I'd like to store and retrieve RDF resources preserving serialization-specific details (e.g. Turtle comments or prefixes).
label: Consistency

text: As a user, I want to use my WebID to register/authenticate everywhere on the Web, in and out of my pod
label: Authentication

text: As an IoT developer, I want to have a lightweight authentication mechanism so that my very small microcontrollers can authenticate themselves
label: Authentication

text: As a citizen, I want to use an identity verified by my government so that I can we can trust each other's identity in my country.
label: Authentication

text: As a citizen, I want to store my local council's contact details so that I can reach out for community issues.
label: Contacts

text: As a client, I want a secure chat so that I can discuss confidential matters with my lawyer.
label: Chat

text: As a client, I want to save my consultant's contact information so that I can get advice on my project.
label: Contacts

text: As a consumer, I want a feature to save manufacturer contact details so that I can inquire about product specifications when needed.
label: Contacts

text: As a customer, I want a chat option so that I can inquire about products and services.
label: Chat

text: As a customer, I want a chatbot so that I can get quick answers to common questions.
label: Chat

text: As a customer, I want to easily retrieve the store manager's contact for complaints about products.
label: Contacts

text: As a guest, I want an organized list of hotel services' contact numbers so that I can request services without searching.
label: Contacts

text: As a gamer, I want an in-game chat so that I can communicate with other players.
label: Chat

text: As a job applicant, I want to save HR's contact details so that I can follow up on my application status.
label: Contacts

text: As a member, I want a community chat so that I can interact with other members.
label: Chat

text: As a member, I want to have a directory of admin contacts so that I can report platform issues.
label: Contacts

text: As a parent, I want a monitored chat so that I can ensure my child's online safety.
label: Chat

text: As a passenger, I want a feature to save and update airline contact details so I can easily manage my flight bookings.
label: Contacts

text: As a patient, I want to store my doctor's contact information so that I can reach out when I experience symptoms.
label: Contacts

text: As a reader, I want a repository of authors' contact details so that I can provide feedback on their books.
label: Contacts

text: As a remote worker, I want a video chat so that I can have virtual meetings.
label: Chat

text: As a student, I want a class chat so that I can discuss assignments with classmates.
label: Chat

text: As a student, I want an organized contact list of professors so that I can reach out with questions outside of lectures.
label: Contacts

text: As a team member, I want a group chat so that I can collaborate with my colleagues.
label: Chat

text: As a tenant, I want a system to store and update my landlord's contact details for reporting maintenance issues.
label: Contacts

text: As a user, I want a chat feature so that I can communicate with other users in real time.
label: Chat

text: As a user, I want a chat history so that I can refer back to previous conversations.
label: Chat

text: As a user, I want an intuitive contact form on websites so that I can send inquiries without navigating away.
label: Contacts

text: As a user, I want a live chat feature so that I can get instant support.
label: Chat

text: As a user, I want a mobile chat so that I can communicate on the go.
label: Chat

text: As a user, I want a private chat so that I can have one-on-one conversations.
label: Chat

text: As a user, I want an encrypted chat so that my conversations remain private.
label: Chat

text: As a user, I want to categorize my contacts so that I can quickly find the person or organization I need.
label: Contacts

text: As a Developer, I want to aggregate data from different databases so that I can create a unified view of the data.
label: Aggregation

text: As a Project Manager, I want to see aggregated project progress reports so that I can make informed decisions.
label: Aggregation

text: As a Quality Assurance Engineer, I want to test the data aggregation process to ensure it's error-free.
label: Aggregation

text: As a Developer, I want to aggregate user feedback so that I can prioritize feature development.
label: Aggregation

text: As a Project Manager, I want to aggregate team performance metrics so that I can identify areas for improvement.
label: Aggregation

text: As a Quality Assurance Engineer, I want to verify the accuracy of aggregated data to ensure it's reliable.
label: Aggregation

text: As a Developer, I want to aggregate system logs so that I can troubleshoot issues effectively.
label: Aggregation

text: As a Project Manager, I want to aggregate resource usage data so that I can optimize resource allocation.
label: Aggregation

text: As a Quality Assurance Engineer, I want to test the system's ability to aggregate large volumes of data to ensure it's scalable.
label: Aggregation

text: As a Developer, I want to aggregate real-time data so that I can provide up-to-date information to users.
label: Aggregation

text: As a Developer, I want to ensure data consistency across all databases so that users always see accurate data.
label: Consistency

text: As a Project Manager, I want to ensure consistency in project deliverables so that we meet quality standards.
label: Consistency

text: As a Quality Assurance Engineer, I want to test for data consistency to ensure the system's reliability.
label: Consistency

text: As a Developer, I want to implement consistency checks in the code to prevent bugs.
label: Consistency

text: As a Project Manager, I want to ensure consistency in team processes so that we can work efficiently.
label: Consistency

text: As a Quality Assurance Engineer, I want to verify the consistency of user interfaces to ensure a good user experience.
label: Consistency

text: As a Developer, I want to ensure consistency in error handling so that I can troubleshoot issues effectively.
label: Consistency

text: As a Project Manager, I want to ensure consistency in communication so that everyone is on the same page.
label: Consistency

text: As a Quality Assurance Engineer, I want to check for consistency in system performance under different loads.
label: Consistency

text: As a Developer, I want to ensure consistency in system behavior across different platforms and devices.
label: Consistency

text: As a Developer, I want to ensure that our website is accessible to users with visual impairments so that everyone can use our services.
label: Accessibility

text: As a Quality Assurance Engineer, I want to test the system's compliance with accessibility standards to ensure we meet legal requirements.
label: Accessibility

text: As a Project Manager, I want to ensure that accessibility is considered in every phase of the project so that our product is inclusive.
label: Accessibility

text: As a Developer, I want to implement keyboard navigation in our application to improve accessibility for users with motor disabilities.
label: Accessibility

text: As a Quality Assurance Engineer, I want to verify that all elements of our application have appropriate alt text to improve screen reader accessibility.
label: Accessibility
